title: Riot your champ select chat is rigged and bugged
body:
1. I'm always last to connect which is total bs especially in blind pick queues, it never used to happen in NA.
2. Team Builder is a poor alternative because it takes 30 minutes to find a team despite the fact it's superior in every way to blind pick.
3. I'm really mad.
4. fix pls.
5. ty for your time.

replies.body:
>I'm always last to connect which is total bs especially in blind pick queues, it never used to happen in NA.

You don't think this has anything to do with your connection?

>Team Builder is a poor alternative because it takes 30 minutes to find a team despite the fact it's superior in every way to blind pick.

Comparing Blind Pick to Team Builder is like comparing a perfectly functional car to a potato. They just aren't in the same league.

>I'm really mad.

Being mad won't really get you anywhere, really.

But I'm here to help you, so let's do just that. What OS do you use, and who's your ISP?
My OS is Windows 7 and my ISP is Telstra.
[And do you get any major abnormalities when you check your connection on Netalyzr?](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/)
